title: Ticket #3878: Python Bindings Tests - Waiting on Brian B
description:
Python bindings

We want a test to verify from both a personal buildspace/testspace that we can test the python bindings. Yet we want the same test to work in the build and test which has the built interfaces to python in a different location.

I got 16 of 20 tests to run but need this to not be using unit test functions.
